Package org.ldaptive.concurrent

Interface Summary
OperationWorker<Q extends Request,S> Interface for ldap operation workers.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAggregateSearchExecutor<T extends ConnectionFactory> Base class for aggregate search executors.
AbstractOperationWorker<Q extends Request,S> Base class for worker operations.
AbstractParallelSearchExecutor<T extends ConnectionFactory> Base class for parallel search executors.
AbstractSearchExecutor Base class for concurrent search executors.
AddOperationWorker Executes an ldap add operation on a separate thread.
AggregatePooledSearchExecutor Executes a list of search filters in parallel over a list of connection factories, each search is performed on a separate connection in the pool.
AggregateSearchExecutor Executes a list of search filters in parallel over a list of connection factories.
BindOperationWorker Executes an ldap bind operation on a separate thread.
CompareOperationWorker Executes an ldap compare operation on a separate thread.
DeleteOperationWorker Executes an ldap delete operation on a separate thread.
ModifyDnOperationWorker Executes an ldap modify dn operation on a separate thread.
ModifyOperationWorker Executes an ldap modify operation on a separate thread.
ParallelPooledSearchExecutor Executes a list of search filters in parallel, each search is performed on a separate connection in the pool.
ParallelSearchExecutor Executes a list of search filters in parallel.
QueueingSearchExecutor Executes a search filter and places the results of the operation on a blocking queue.
QueueingSearchExecutor.SearchItem Contains data returned when using the QueueingSearchExecutor.
SearchOperationWorker Executes an ldap search operation on a separate thread.
